projects.name: Kurozora App
projects.description: Kurozora iOS client app gives users access to the huge catalog of anime, manga and games on iPhone, iPod, iPad and Mac.

projects.name: KurozoraKit
projects.description: KurozoraKit is a simple to use framework for interacting with the Kurozora API.

projects.name: Kurozora Android
projects.description: Kurozora Android client app gives users access to the huge catalog of anime, manga and games on Android phones and tablets.

projects.name: Kurozora Linux
projects.description: Kurozora Linux client app gives users access to the huge catalog of anime, manga and games on Linux and Windows systems.

projects.name: Kurozora Discord Bot
projects.description: Kurozora Discord Bot (KuroBot) is a versatile bot that gives users access to Kurozora services right on their Discord servers.

projects.name: Kurozora Web Extension
projects.description: Kurozora Web Extension is an Anime, Manga and Game search engine for FireFox and Chrome.
